name: 2nd International Conference on Renewable and Sustainable Energy (RENEWABLEENG-2024 – Hybrid Edition)
content: Xperts Meetings invites all the participants across the globe to attend “2nd International Conference on Renewable and Sustainable Energy (RENEWABLEENG-2024 – Hybrid Edition)” both on-site and virtually on September 26-28, 2024, in Paris, France and Virtually by Zoom.
